quote: I've heard it both ways.
You know that's right!
Wait for iiiit...
Come on, son!
Suck it!
actor: James Roday Rodriguez (Shawn Spencer) and Dulé Hill (Burton 'Gus' Guster)

quote: Gus, don't be the gooey chocolate chip in my cookie of life.
The tension in here is so thick, you could cut it with a knife. A dull, rusty butter knife.
You must be outta your damn mind!
I’m Shawn Spencer, psychic detective for the Santa Barbara Police Department.
Do you have any idea what I’ve been through? The stress? The headaches? The jury duty?
Gus, don't be a rabid porcupine.
Gus, don't be this crevice in my arm.
I've solved it.
You heard about Pluto? That's messed up, right?
Gus, don't be the only black lead on a major cable network.
I’ve got the ‘Yips’!
Just because you put syrup on something doesn’t make it pancakes.
Gus, don’t be a telltale, titmouse.
Shawn! Gus! Don’t be the last three people to discover something!
Shawn, are you telling me you can’t tell the difference between an elephant and a guy in an elephant costume?
We’re gonna be the kings of taco day!
Don’t be the ribs I had for lunch.
Chief, I’m gonna need a dozen plums, ASAP.
